title: No proper support from Google India
content:
Problem with 20 days old phone. Sent thrice problem not resolved.

Last sent the device on 23.10.2019 no proper reply from google INDIA and no proper update about phone on phone call as well.

Latest Service Request No: GL0087204

Pls help sort out the issue this is a new phone was sef only 20 days..

Rishabh
